subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Sébastien Bourdais won for the first time in four races and regained control of the Champ Car title chase, running away with the Grand Prix of Edmonton. The 28-year-old Bourdais, seeking an unprecedented fourth straight series title, heads for next week’s race in San Jose, Calif., 20 points ahead of Robert Doornbos.
